caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. JAMAL ARMSTEAD, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District.

opinion.posture: Petition for Allowance of Appeal from Order of the Superior Court No. 364 EAL 2000.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 6th day of February, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
